presentacion: Passionate about technology, experienced in developing modern SPA applications and secure REST APIs.Always learning and striving to add real value to projects.
quien_soy_texto: I am a Web Developer and enthusiast of operating systems and cybersecurity. Since I can remember, I have been passionate about new technologies and innovation. I love the world of video games and everything related to fiction, and I always look for ways to integrate my passions into my projects.
como_trabajo_texto: My priority is to meet your company's needs while providing efficient and quality service. You can count on me to solve your problems and provide clarifications whenever you need them.
donde_me_desplazo_texto: I am willing to travel throughout Extremadura and Alentejo if necessary to solve any kind of problem. I live in Elvas, Portugal, so I will prioritize closer trips.
objetivo_profesional_texto: I hope to develop my skills in the field of IT and grow both personally and professionally.
resumen_texto: I am motivated to keep learning, add real value wherever I work, and grow both professionally and personally. I hope to contribute with my skills, attitude, and commitment to the success of the team and the projects I participate in.
contacto_consulta: You can contact me for any inquiry or project you are interested in.
contacto_dudas: Feel free to contact me to discuss your ideas!
